DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine in-vivo ultrafiltration coefficient different size xevonta High-Flux dialyzer follow FDA guideline .
DOC.brief_title: Determination Vivo Ultrafiltration Coefficient ( KUF ) Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease ( CKD )
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent obtain patient parents/ guardian . Subject age > = 18 Effective blood flow 350 ml/min dialysate flow 500 ml/min On hemodialysis minimum 3 month Use Cimino Goretex shunt Routine dialysistreatment 240 min Documented dialysis adequacy parameter stable past 3 month Plan dialyze participate hemodialysis centre least 3months duration . Free currently know unusual clot access problem Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HbsAg ) negative , document within past 90 day Hepatitis B surface antibody ( antiHBs ) positive . Anti Hepatitis C Virus ( AntiHCV ) negative , document within past 90 day Anti Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( Anti HIV ) negative , document within past 90 day Hematocrit ( HCT ) 25 40 % haemoglobin ( Hb ) less 8 g/dL , document 14 day prior first treatment Patients unable tolerate effective blood flow 350 ml/min Patients use catheter dialysis Pregnant nursing woman . Women childbearing potential must agree avoid pregnancy study period use hormonal contraception ( implantable ; patch ; oral ) and/ doublebarrier method ( double combination : IUD ; condom spermicidal gel ; diaphragm ; sponge ; cervical cap ) Previous plan extend absence participate hemodialysis centre Expected transplanted ( live relate donor ) within maximum 3 month study period Any serious medical condition disability , opinion investigator , would interfere treatment assessment preclude completion study
